backend.name: AnyNewsBot-Python-Epub-TTS-Podcast
backend.description: A Python application designed to access paid news content by crossing payroll barriers, convert the content into EPUB format, and utilize Text-to-Speech (TTS) technology to read it aloud, allowing users to conveniently listen to the news during their commute.
features:
Adds proper metadata for Apple Music
- Uses adva

backend.name: API-Integration-H2DB-authentication
backend.description: A Api integration task with springboot,mysql for user registration and authentication and book management.

android.name: carbot-js-ai
android.description: A customized carbot with better funtionalities than Google Assitant from Android Auto.
